participant_1.background:
I have to use social media for work, but it's not a big part of my life.
i am fairly conservative in politics.
I started a blog to share my love of romance novels with others.
i have never traveled out of the country.
My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.

participant_2.background:
I don't like to dress up because I am more comfortable in my own clothes.
i work in a coffee shop.
i am a lawyer.
I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.
i like the taste of cheese.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Not bad, not bad! My day's starting out pretty slow.
Me too. I'm trying to get some work done, but I'm having trouble focusing.
I know how that goes. What kind of work do you do?
I'm a teacher. I teach high school English.
That sounds like a really fun job! I'm a lawyer.
Oh wow! I bet that's a lot of pressure.
It can be, but it's also really rewarding.
What's your favorite thing about being a lawyer?
I love helping people and getting to solve problems.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great lawyer.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what do you do for fun outside of work?
I like to read, go to the gym, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to read too. What are your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I really love romance novels.
Oh, I've never read a romance novel before. What's your favorite one?
I don't know if I have a favorite, but I really enjoyed "The Notebook."
I've heard good things about that book. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new books to read.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about books
